Hi,
   I use HtmlUnit for testing our web application. To
test one of the web components, I need to set a
specific cookie before the component can be tested. 

I tried,
webConnection.getStateForUrl(url).addCookie(myCookie).


But, the method getStateForUrl always returns null and
the above always failed. 

If you any of you ran into a similar issue, could you
please share your thoughts/ideas on the same.

Thank you
Srini
